definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to pay sb according to their productivity

household responsibility system, introduced in the early 1980s, under which each rural household could freely decide what to produce and how to sell, as long as it fulfilled its quota of products to the state
to pay remuneration according to output (idiom)
rural household contract responsibility system, PRC government policy linking rural income to productivity
pinyin: nong2 cun1 jia1 ting2 lian2 chan3 cheng2 bao1 ze2 ren4 zhi4
containing_words.word: 農村家庭聯產承包責任制

sentences.english: However the market economy system has brought about a strong dash to the heating supply of the cogeneration.
sentences.chinese: 市場經濟體制帶給熱電聯產向採暖供熱以猛烈衝擊。

sentences.english: The combined heat and power unit turbine control systems were studied.
sentences.chinese: 並對熱電聯產機組汽機控制系統進行了分析。

sentences.english: The cogeneration has rapidly developed in our country under the planning system.
sentences.chinese: 計劃經濟體制下，我國的熱電聯產得到迅速發展。

sentences.english: Chapter four is the thought of household responsibility system.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是家庭聯產承包責任制思想。

sentences.english: This province product with in Gao Lian product is given priority to.
sentences.chinese: 該省產品以中高聯產品爲主。

sentences.english: It is noted that "Co-product" method is the know-how of the Halcon method.
sentences.chinese: 指出，“聯產物法”是哈康法成功的決竅。

sentences.english: Heating-electricity combined generation is an available method of energy conservation.
sentences.chinese: 熱電聯產是節約能源有效途徑之一。

sentences.english: The cost driver of cooperation cost lies on compositive variables.
sentences.chinese: 協同成本的動因在於聯產品的組成變量。

sentences.english: Clean-coal technology and integrated systems will bring China a range of critical new benefits.
sentences.chinese: 清潔煤技術和多聯產能源系統會給中國帶來巨大好處。

sentences.english: Greatly develop clean coal and thermal-power central heating technology;
sentences.chinese: 大力發展清潔利用煤炭和熱電聯產集中供熱技術。

sentences.english: The household contract responsibility system does not mean privatization of the rural economy.
sentences.chinese: 家庭聯產承包制並不意味着農村經濟私有化。

sentences.english: It is noted that "Co-product" method is the know-how of th…
sentences.chinese: 指出，“聯產物法”是哈康法成功的決竅。

sentences.english: It is noted that "Co-product" method is …
sentences.chinese: 指出，“聯產物法”是哈康法成功的決竅。

sentences.english: The co-generation of heat and power can save energy , it also can improve the environment condition by reducing small boilers.
sentences.chinese: 熱電聯產可以節能降耗，減少小鍋爐對環境的污染。
